channel.title: Legacy 718/742! VPS Hosted! Hiring Staff!
channel.description:
[center]Website: http://legacyrsps.info
Legacy 718 Join in with the Fun!
Brand New Start - Server has just been released! We look forward to creating a great community to play with in the future!
We Take SMS And Paypal Donations! Amazing Donation Rewards For SMS And Paypal!
We are currently Hiring a small staff team to moderate the server. Applications for Staff Positions can be found on the forums.
VPS HOSTED 4GB NO LAG Will Upgrade It If We Get a Higher Playercount
[url=http://legacyrsps.info]Forums[/url]
[url=http://legacy.net46.net/index.php?/topic/11-play-webclient/unread/]Webclient (Check Forums)[/url]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?clhsxaf84bbzj8c]Desktop Client[/url]
Features: Nomad Nex StrykeWyrms Kalphite Queen Corporeal Beast QBD Alot More To See In-Game ! Dungeoneering Bosses Drops: Primal Armour Nex Piece Armour Chaotics Alot Of Minigames : Soul Wars Clan Wars Duel Arena Fight Caves Barrows
Donator Features: Amazing Donator Shop Dicing Custom Titles Donator Only Teleports Donator Only Commands Higher XP & Drop Rates
I have a couple of screenshots. Nothing big like, but its just a glimpse at the server: (Will add more later)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HE66rAS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lHVOh5l.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uA1rC3u.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aerjxl7.png[/img][/center]
